channel.title: CVE Feed for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache XML Graphics FOP
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Apache Software Foundation -- Apache XML Graphics FOP

item.title: CVE-2024-28168|2024-10-09T15:02:59.140Z -- apache%20software%20foundation -- apache%20xml%20graphics%20fop
item.description:
Improper Restriction of XML External Entity Reference ('XXE') vulnerability in Apache XML Graphics FOP.
This issue affects Apache XML Graphics FOP: 2.9.
Users are recommended to upgrade to version 2.10, which fixes the issue.
